title: All the Backlist! August 23, 2019
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including Ella Minnow Pea.
This episode is sponsored by the Flash Gordon audiobook series from Paperback Classics, a new imprint that brings the best vintage pulp paperbacks to audio!
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
The Revolution of Birdie Randolph by Brandy Colbert
Little & Lion by Brandy Colbert
Ella Minnow Pea by Mark Dunn
The Bees by Laline Paull
Sometimes the Wolf by Urban Waite
The Girls at the Kingfisher Club by Genevieve Valentine
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
